attributes.action: Review the policy of rehabillitating offenders to favour punishment over help to criminals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Offenders of crime, no matter what that might be should only be punished for what they have done.
No help should be given to people when they do wrong.
Punishments should increase for re-offenders and serial offenders should spend their whole life in prison.
